Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2014 03:18PM leighawill wrote: Hello Ladies, I had a lumpectomy on Jan 22, 2014, which was easy.  Now I'm trying to decide on radiation and Tamoxifen for 5 years or (double) mastectomy? Most of my family want me to get the mastectomy, but my boyfriend of 4 years is leaning toward radiation, but says he will support me with whatever I chose.  After a mastectomy how long is it before you can wear a padded bra??? Confused, Leigh Anne
